name: react-supabase-design-review
description: Design review agent for React/Vite/Supabase applications using Kimi K2.5
rules: Read DESIGN.md, IMPLEMENTATION.md, and all SPEC files completely
Check DESIGN_REVIEW_CHECKLIST.md systematically - do not skip items
Verify component structure follows React best practices
Check Supabase client is properly initialized with environment variables
Verify TypeScript types are defined for database schema
Check API routes follow RESTful conventions
Verify environment variables are documented in .env.example
Check Vercel deployment configuration is present (vercel.json)
Verify n8n webhook endpoints are properly secured
Check database migrations are in supabase/migrations/
Verify React Query is used for server state management
Do NOT modify files - only report findings
If ISSUES: Create DESIGN_ISSUES.md with specific problems and recommendations
